reviewText: This is a NR HBO series (so not appropriate for kids). But so funny, we love it. We have all the seasons.
Arrived quickly. Great price. Had no problems with anything. Loved the fact that I got 2 seasons in a group package.
The price is for seperate season is cheaper than getting the entire collection at once and whatever I feel like watching, I can watch it.
Arrived on time and packed well.  Always a good choice.  A great addition to my DVD library.  Tales from the Crypt is a favorite of mine.

When I was young my cousin and I would have sleep overs and stay up late watch this show.  Now as adults I decided to purchase some of the DVDs to give him as a stocking stuffer for Xmas.  Something fun from our youth to remember.  As a child i remember being scared by some of the stories.... But compared to today's graphic horror films  they are fun and tongue and cheek.  What is great about the series are the cameos of famous actors that were then obviously just starting their acting careers then.  A worth while purchase!
The videos arrived in no time flat and were just as creepy as I remembered.  Those of you who are Tales From the Crypt Fans: totally worth the purchase!!  Perfect for a Creepfest Marathon.
Good editions, too bad that the Fifth season (like the four season!!!) is completely without English subtitles: why WARNER has done such a things like this ?!?
These movies is a must buy, i recieved them quick, without defeact...two thumbs. I bought all seven season. I watch these movies in my childhood and i had to have them

tales from the crypt is a awesome show. this is one of my favorite shows. i love the crypt keeper he is hillarious. the best episodes in this show are

if you have not seen these seasons then i recommend you do

Since 1980, I loved this tv series, they are short horror-drama and suspense mini chapter. Enough to enjoy one evening during dinner. Also , too many good actor and actress act on some of the chapters.
Awesome stories! Fun to watch!
Not to scary but it's fun little horror stories make you keep on guessing

Great series! This show is at the top of the list for best horror series.
If you like horror and this series then it's an A+!

My fiance loves tales from the crypt and so do I. So i got to enjoy them as well when I got them for his birthday. I also got seasons 1-4 and we spent many hours watching them and still do on occasion. Its one of our guilty pleasures the crypt keeper is to die for.
the old faschineting series as ever!
thank you it was what I was looking for so long
Tales from the Crypt was one of my favorite shows. Glad to have them all on DVD now.

Well, nothing but great things to say about these dvds. I wanted to watch them sooooo bad, that after I got a missed delivery slip from usps. I went to the post office just to have to end up running down the post lady on my bike after finding out that she still had them. I love the Crypt Keeper's(John Kassir) laugh!!!!

Also, my favorite episode entitled Oil's Well That Ends Well from Season 5 seemed as if I had seen yesterday; in 1995 that is. ...!!!
was on time and everything was as I expeded

Tales from the Crypt is LEGENDARY! This combo of seasons 5 & 6 is a great collection of many more ELITE shows.

My personal favorites from SEASON 5: Death of Some Salesmen (favorite from season 5), Forever Ambergris, Creep Course.

My personal favorites from SEASON 6: Let the punishment fit the crime, 99 & 44/100% Pure Horror(favorite from season 6).

Loaded with terrific episodes on both seasons 5 & 6. Strong recommendation to add these two seasons to your collection. I suggest passing on season # 7 :(
great
I love Tales From The Crypt & this was a great bargain! I added this to my collection of TFTC!
Absolutely amazing, one of the best shows ever made, and a price you can not beat!!! If you're a horror fan you'll love this!!!

I am very impressed with these seasons and I am considering buying the seventh season soon as well. My family enjoys watching these and they bring back some memories of some of the actors and actresses that you don't see anymore. There are some episodes that are not as good as other's but most of them we like.
Good overall for the time of production and available special effects.  Love the Crypt Keeper and his strange but entertaining  scenarios.
Tales from the crypt stories are as good as I remember them. When watching them I feel like I'm reading the comic.

I found these on Amazon after not finding them in any stores. One of my sons always loved this series and wanted to rewatch them. Not exactly my choice for entertainment but he sure loves this series!!
Great series,i hadn't seen it since way back .I think i enjoyed it more this time! Happy with my purchase.
It was an awesome deal for these, but one of my discs came with a puncture in it. It was completely unplayable.
This is the best show since the twilight zone, the sixth season goes especially hard and the cryptkeeper is punstoppable.

I'veen seen this show originally in HBO, and i like it very much. The package is good enough for the price, the discs has been treated very well, inside has good pictures of the show, and the quality of the image and the sound are acceptable. Is a good stuff for fans, and the 1st. season has a good extras.
This was just as the discription said! The cases were perfect and still wrapped. It is a gift so thats just what i needed.
Great Movie to any horror collection.  Going to make a perfect gift for our horror movie buff in the family.
Awesome!
Better than I remembered the show as being. We now have all 7 seasons. Each DVD isbetter than the last.
This Box Set includes Two packages for one price!!. Good alternative to collector people. I recommend buy two either one

The beauty of Tales from the Crypt is that no one episode holds the weight of the series on its shoulders. The good episodes don't make the series better and the bad episodes don't make it worse. It just is outstanding.
Love this series, glad i could buy this from the states. Since i can get this in Europe. And very good price :-)

I am a big fan of this former HBO series. I didn't always have access to HBO, but I remember some of these stories.
  Season 5 favorites include Death of some Salesmen, Forever Ambergris, People who live in Brass Hearses,Two for the Show, House of Horror, Creep Course, Well cooked Hams, Came the Dawn, Half way Horrible. In other words, Get this set. You'll love it. It's got mummies, Siamese twins, creepy college kids,  and backwoods freaks. As usual, everyone will get what they deserve. Maybe even you, kiddies.
I love the series and it just gets better further in the series you go. The humor and corny puns are half the fun.

Loved it, cant get enough of tales fromthr crypt
Not true what the negative reviews, great all the way thru season 7

the EC comics are great for what they did with that medium, pushing the envelope and raising the bar, but the HBO series is great because they R-rated and modernized these stories for a savy Adult audience.

Hello Boils and Ghouls! It's your old pal the Crypt Keeper here, Just thought I would stop by and take over this account to tell you how awesome this DVD set it. The stories I tell are chilling, hilarious, and will make you scream in the night like a little girl! Hahahahahahehehehehe....

It is worth your money to buy these, see for yourself....

Bye for now...

Hahahahahahahahahaha!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1

What a great deal.  I've collected the entire series.  Like that I can now watch them anytime of day and commericial free.  Excellent series.  It's fun to watch each episode and spy early performances by some of today's leading stars - Brad Pitt and Daniel Craig are just a couple of examples.  The show is campy and fun, and I simply cannot get enough.  Highly recommended.
More of my favorite shows on DVD. Just when you think it don't get any better. No commercials watch a marathon when you want . And at a better price than cable. Great job Thanks :)
It was great finding two seasons for such a low price, too bad they don't come in blu ray. None the less the quirky dark humor make this product well worth buying
One of the main ones Ive seen is You Murderer but I remember watching other episodes when I was 7 or 8 years old back in 96
how can you not like tales from the crypt?
